entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:43 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 10:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: NW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning in the morning then changing to rain showers in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming east 40 gusting to 70 in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
